resources.string: Reflecting a unique blend of ancient and modern architecture, JK Temple is a must visit. The mandapas of the temple have been constructed with high roofs for adequate ventilation of light and air. The JK Trust constructed this temple and is responsible for its maintenance and expenses. The temple is also known as Radhakrishna Temple. As it is dedicated to Lord Krishna.

The beautifully constructed, Shri Radhakrishna Temple (J.K. Temple) is a boon to the devotees. Built by J.K. Trust this architectural delight is a unique blend of ancient architecture with the modern. The even-level roofs of the mandaps have been provided with adequate ventilation for sufficient light and air.

The Jain Glass Temple in Kanpur is dedicated to the worshippers and believers of Jainism, mainly to the apostles and disciples of Lord Mahavira and the remaining 23 Jain Tirthankaras. The temple is intricately decorated in enamel and glass work and displays vibrant stained glass murals and wall paintings that vividly narrate the teachings of the revered Jain scriptures. One can spend hours looking at the architecture of the place. It is a must visit place in Kanpur for every tourist.
You can easily locate the establishment as it is in close proximity to Post Kheora.
